ComicInfo.Summary: The President has been assassinated and thus far the killer has eluded capture. Secret Service Agent Royal pursues her while realizing other agencies in the chase are concealing their identities. There is also evidence that the killer may be a rogue spy personally affiliated with the President. The agent sets a trap to capture the killer, but gets more than he bargained for...
